name: darkrobot.vim
description:
This is a nice dark colorscheme designed for long code editing sessions.

A screenshot can be found here:
http://www.flickr.com/photos/26471999@N08/2488920242/
install_details:
On UNIX-like systems, including Mac OS X or Cygwin, put this file into ~/.vim/colors
On Windows, it should go into C:\Program Files\vim(or Vim)\vimfiles\colors (something like that)
